tool_description: Scraping Google News ,Scraping Google News involves automatically extracting real-time news-related data from the Google News website. This process provides valuable information such as headlines, article content, and publication dates, which can be utilized for research, analysis, and staying up-to-date with current events. However, it's crucial to approach web scraping ethically and in compliance with legal considerations.
name: googlenews
title: googlenews

api_list.name: Get list Country
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://googlenews6.p.rapidapi.com/country"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "googlenews6.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
